pages.text: Gear in this world will spawn with various modifiers both minor and major.$(br2)The rarity of this gear can be extracted and applied to other, non-affixed gear.$(br2)To obtain rarity essence, throw items with rarity into an essence forge in the Nether.

pages.name: Essence Forge
pages.text: A lava source block surrounded by 8 Nether Bricks.

Once essence is obtained, it can be pressed into another item.$(br2)Throw the essence with desired the rarity level onto the smithing table. Then, throw the piece of gear intended to be modified onto the smithing table as well. Activate the piston to apply the essence to the item.$(br2)An item can only have one rarity level.

pages.name: Essence Press
pages.text: A Smithing Table with a Piston facing downwards above it.
